cells.content: The cell uses a sourceforge style
The style of the first column on this row will change depending on the value entered in the second column: negative or positive values
The display of the first column changes with the entered value in the second column
The display of the first column changes with the entered value in the second column
The cell in the first column in the previous row keeps its value, only the display changes. Thus it can be used further in formulas
